respawningshulkers-fabric.duskconfig.DES: The amount of time in ticks it takes for a shulker to respawn after it died. 20 ticks = 1 second. By default 60 seconds.
If enabled, shulkers which spawn from (modded) spawners will not be respawned after a death.
respawningshulkers-fabric.duskconfig.shu: Shulkers From Spawners Do Not Respawn
